price: Wọ́n sọ pé: “À ń fún ọ ní ìró ìdùnnú pẹ̀lú òdodo. Nítorí náà, má ṣe wà lára àwọn olùjákànmùná.”
arabic: قَالُواْ بَشَّرۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡقَٰنِطِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
